Instruction: Whisk together egg yolks, cream, sugar, orange liqueur, and vanilla extract in a small saucepan until well blended.

Heat the mixture in the saucepan over medium-low heat, stirring continuously with a rubber spatula, until it becomes slightly thickened and reaches a temperature of 180 degrees F (82 degrees C), about 8 to 10 minutes.
Allow to cool, strain to remove any cooked particles of egg, and then remove from heat.
